SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Server.Controller

Class ControllerInstance

java.lang.Object
Server.Controller.ControllerInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class ControllerInstance extends Object implements Controller
This is the implementation of the controller interface. It manages the game flow and the game model.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ControllerInstance(GeneralServerConnectionHandler connectionHandler)
    Asks whether the user wants to start a new game or load a saved game and initializes the game model

      Description copied from interface: Controller
      play a card from the hand to the manuscript
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface Controller

      position - the card position in the hand
      xCoord - the x coordinate
      yCoord - the y coordinate
      face - the face choosen by the player
      Throws:
      TooFewElementsException - if the player has already placed a card during the turn
      InvalidMoveException - if it's not the player's turn or the placement is not valid

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player player, DeckPosition deckPosition, Decks deck) throws TooManyElementsException, InvalidMoveException, AlreadyFinishedException, NotYetStartedException

      draw a card from one of the decks
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      deckPosition - where i want to draw the card from
      deck - the deck
      Throws:
      TooManyElementsException - if the player hasn't yet placed a card during the turn
      InvalidMoveException - if it's not the player's turn
      AlreadyFinishedException - if the deck has no cards
      NotYetStartedException - if the game has not yet started

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String oldId, String newId) throws IllegalArgumentException, AlreadySetException, NotYetStartedException, AlreadyFinishedException
      Description copied from interface: Controller
      Reconnects a player to the game
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      oldId - the id of the client who is reconnecting
      newId - the id of the player the client is reconnecting as
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no player with that id
      AlreadySetException - if the player with that id is already connected
      NotYetStartedException - if the game has not yet started
      AlreadyFinishedException - if the game is already finished
